TopicTitle: Ps4 Can't save, ships reloading in from previous mission orbit

Articles.Content:
Career mode starting minmus missions. When loading the game I noticed a previous rescue vessel I built in orbit again after rescue mission was complete. I terminated the vessel and moved on to an explore minmus mission. In orbit after an Eva for science recovery and then some time warping I noticed that I could not save or return to the space centre, tracking station or the main menu. The game wasn't froze I just couldn't do anything to save or leave the craft. After another Eva I got the dreaded staging scramble bug.

Edited January 22, 2018 by Space Station 4 Crash

It would be extremely useful for debugging if you could send us your save file for evaluation. You can save it to a USB drive like so: http://www.ign.com/wikis/playstation-4/How_to_Transfer_PS4_Saves

After that you can upload the files to Google Drive or any other file sharing platform and PM me the link. Thanks in advance.
How odd, my saves are perfectly fine.

On 1/24/2018 at 4:05 PM, DunaManiac said:

How odd, my saves are perfectly fine.

It is saving, the problem is sometimes you cannot save.

On 1/23/2018 at 11:21 AM, Samssonart said:

It would be extremely useful for debugging if you could send us your save file for evaluation. You can save it to a USB drive like so: http://www.ign.com/wikis/playstation-4/How_to_Transfer_PS4_Saves

After that you can upload the files to Google Drive or any other file sharing platform and PM me the link. Thanks in advance.

I would love to do that, but I'm kind of a busy guy. If you have a ps4 in the office it should be really easy to recreate the time warp bug. That way you can rapidly check save files as they occur. It seems that after a long time warp you cannot save, return to space center or the main menu. It happens all the time in career mode. I noticed it starting about mid way through the tech tree progress in career mode (when you get into longer time warp situations). I wish you all the best. And I know you will get this fixed.
Arent the ps4 savefiles related to the psn Account? AT least at minecraft u couldnt open savefiles without the Account they Came from
